data.eml:eml: Nomenclatural and taxonomic notes on three South-East Asian species of Amata (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae: Syntomini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article De Freina, Josef J., Prins, Willy De (2018): Nomenclatural and taxonomic notes on three South-East Asian species of Amata (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae: Syntomini). Zootaxa 4461 (1): 141-145, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4461.1.11
